awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'

projects.name: Bibigo Website Improvement Proposal
highlights: Proposed improvements for user registration and purchase flows on Bibigo's website based on benchmarking analysis of competitor platforms and current industry trends.
Recommended streamlined purchase processes, revised user registration prompts, and suggested fixes for product search errors after evaluating APIs and prototypes.
Proposed personalized content strategies, such as tailored product or recipe recommendations in welcome emails, to increase user engagement based on competitor analysis.

projects.name: Course Break Friend Matching App
highlights: Spearheaded the planning and ideation of an Android app to enhance social interaction among university students during the pandemic.
Collaborated with a team member to develop a matching system that paired students based on similar schedules, utilizing React Native, PHP, and MySQL.

projects.name: UCLA Admissions Data Analysis
highlights: Analyzed UCLA admissions data using classification models (Random Forest, SVM, k-NN, Decision Tree) in R to assess trends in admission decisions and model performance through confusion matrices.

projects.name: Weather-Focused Social Networking Service
highlights: Led the ideation and theme selection for an app enabling users to share daily experiences based on weather conditions.

Executed comprehensive modeling processes, including system configuration and entity analysis, utilizing ERD creation for the MySQL database design, while developing the front-end interface using React.

projects.name: Volunteer Matchmaking Website
projects.summary: Group Leader, Front-End Developer, Database Developer
highlights: Built a volunteer matchmaking website connecting college students with organizations in Busan, using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and MySQL.

projects.name: Dear Me: A Self-Affirmation Journey
highlights: Conceptualized and coordinated the 'Mirror Project', addressing societal issues faced by youth experiencing depression and anxiety while promoting self-affirmation for those generous to others but harsh on themselves.
Oversaw shooting processes and ensured effective narrative delivery by researching relevant references, strategically selecting subtitles, and editing video content to enhance audience comprehension.
